SEARCH
Package Game

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
Game.GameEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovementControl
public class GameEngine extends Object implements MovementControl
The GameEngine class is the central component of the game, coordinating interactions between various game elements such as the traffic network, vehicles, and the player. It implements the MovementControl interface to manage vehicle movements within the game.

      Parameters:

      arrayList - The list of vehicles considered for the check.
      Returns:

    • validateMoveChoice

      public Position validateMoveChoice(Vehicle vehicle, Position newPosition)
      Validates the proposed movement choice of a vehicle, ensuring it's feasible within the current game state and traffic conditions.
      Specified by:
      validateMoveChoice in interface MovementControl
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle making the move.
      newPosition - The proposed new position for the vehicle.
      Returns:
      The validated position, which may be the same as the proposed position or adjusted.
